## TrustOptions interface

Options controlling how trust verification is performed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface TrustOptions 
```

_(Optional)_ Directory where the trust manifest is stored. Defaults to the process config dir when omitted.

</td><td>


</td><td>

string \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Namespace used for TOFU and manifest lookups. Typically the CLI name or a stable identifier for the executable.

</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ When `true`<!-- -->, skip Sigstore verification even if the package is installed. Useful in offline environments.
